title: EXPLOITATION - CHECK PLAN CONFIGURATION (Test and Prod-Like)

task_list.instruction_title:
Check CONTROL-M EV3 PLAN CONFIGURATION par check CONTROL-M EV3 GROUPE E3_TOO_Tools/E3_AJF-ATLAS-INTEGRATION-BANQUE / 
                                                                                check Fichier de configuration /appli/ctmsrvintg/CTM_TOOLS/Gestion_Release_Plan/config/RELEASE_PLAN_EV3.cfg

Check CONTROL-M EV4 PLAN CONFIGURATION par check CONTROL-M EV4 GROUPE E4_TOO_Tools/E4_AJF-ATLAS-INTEGRATION-BANQUE
                                                                                check Fichier de configuration /appli/ctmsrvintg/CTM_TOOLS/Gestion_Release_Plan/config/RELEASE_PLAN_EV4.cfg

PRD Only : 

Check CONTROL-M PROD PLAN CONFIGURATION par check CONTROL-M PROD GROUPE TOO_Tools/ AJF-ATLAS-INTEGRATION-BANQUE  è pour FINAL RUN
                                                                                check Fichier de configuration /appli/ctmsrvintg/CTM_TOOLS/Gestion_Release_Plan/config/RELEASE_PLAN_PRD.cfg
